Address.value: 1 CORPORATE WAY, LANSING, Michigan, 48951, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Jackson Financial Inc helps Americans grow and protect their retirement savings and income to enable them to pursue financial freedom for life. Its retail product offerings comprise annuities, designed to help retail investors save for and live in retirement. Its diverse suite of annuities includes a variable, fixed index, and fixed annuities. It manages the business through three segments: Retail Annuities, Institutional Products, and Closed Life and Annuity Blocks.

value.name: Devkumar Ganguly
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
